api.ripley

Class Ripley

  • Object
    • Ripley

  • public class Ripley
extends Object
    A local proxy library designed to facilitate communication with a remote API distributing UFO sighting data.
    Author:
    Martin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ripley(String privateKey, String publicKey)
      This library accesses a closed, remote API, for which a private and public key are needed.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ripley

        public Ripley(String privateKey,
              String publicKey)
        This library accesses a closed, remote API, for which a private and public key are needed.
        Parameters:
        privateKey - Your group's unique private key
        publicKey - Your group's unique public key

    • Method Detail

      • getIncidentsInRange

        public ArrayList<Incident> getIncidentsInRange(String start,
                                               String end)
        Provides a list of UFO sighting incidents during a given time period.
        Parameters:
        start - The start date from which to collect incidents (format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss)
        end - The end date to which to collect incidents (format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss)
        Returns:
        A list of the incidents that have occurred during this timeframe @see api.ripley.Incident

      • getIncidentDetails

        public String getIncidentDetails(String id)
        Provides additional decriptive details of a UFO sighting incident.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique incident ID.
        Returns:
        The details of this incident.

      • getVersion

        public double getVersion()
        Returns:
        The current API version.

      • getStartYear

        public int getStartYear()
        Returns:
        The first year from which incident records are available.

      • getLatestYear

        public int getLatestYear()
        Returns:
        The last year to which incident records are available.

      • getLastUpdated

        public String getLastUpdated()
        Returns:
        The last time a set of incident details were received.

      • getAcknowledgementString

        public String getAcknowledgementString()
        Returns:
        An acknowledgement string to be shown by all programs using this library, and the associated API.
